incomeAllocation.title: Income Allocation
incomeAllocation.tooltip: Shows how your monthly income is allocated across expenses, subscriptions, installments, and net savings. Helps identify spending patterns and savings potential.
incomeAllocation.emptyState: No income data available for the current month

netWorthTrend.title: Net Worth Trend
netWorthTrend.description: Track your wealth growth over time
netWorthTrend.tooltip: Visualizes net worth changes over time. Net Worth = Assets (portfolio + savings) - Liabilities (debts). Helps track wealth building progress.
netWorthTrend.emptyState: No net worth data available for the selected period

subscriptionsByCategory.title: Subscriptions by Category
subscriptionsByCategory.tooltip: Shows all active subscriptions grouped by category. Amounts are monthly equivalents regardless of billing frequency.

installmentsByCategory.title: Installments by Category
installmentsByCategory.tooltip: Shows all active installment plans grouped by category. Displays monthly payment amounts.

expensesByCategory.title: Expenses by Category
expensesByCategory.tooltip: Shows expense breakdown by category for the selected period. Helps identify major spending areas.

budgetsByCategory.title: Budgets by Category
budgetsByCategory.tooltip: Shows all active budgets grouped by category. Each budget tracks expenses within its own time period.
